summary.overview: The CU03 transaction provides user deletion functionality for the CardDemo application, allowing authorized administrators to remove user accounts from the system. Users can search for a specific user by ID, view their details for confirmation, and then delete the user record with appropriate validation and confirmation messages.
business_functions: Program Initialization - Initialize program variables and check if program is being called for first time or re-entered
Screen Entry Point Validation - Validate if user ID is provided when entering the screen
User Input Validation - Validate that user ID field is not empty before processing
User Information Lookup - Read user details from USRSEC file based on provided user ID
User Details Display - Display retrieved user information (first name, last name, user type) on screen
Delete Confirmation Processing - Process user confirmation to delete the selected user
User Record Deletion - Delete the user record from USRSEC file
Delete Success Notification - Display confirmation message when user is successfully deleted
Function Key Processing - Handle different function keys (PF3, PF4, PF5, PF12) for various operations
Screen Clear Functionality - Clear all input fields and reset screen to initial state
Navigation to Previous Screen - Return to calling program or default admin screen
Error Message Display - Display appropriate error messages for various validation failures
Screen Header Population - Populate screen header with current date, time, program and transaction details
